title: SUMMER MOVING**ONE OF THE KIND OPPORTUNITY**WON'T LAST**
posting_body: ["SUMMER MOVING**ONE OF THE KIND OPPORTUNITY**WON'T LAST**", 'Listing ID #: 212982', 'Price: $2,900', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: Studio', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 610 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Open View', '- Elegant and charming flex one bedroom apartment with high ceilings, hard wood floors and oversized windows.', 'The kitchen features stainless steel appliances ,Washer / Dryer in the unit, granite countertops, and frosted glass walnut cabinetry.', 'The bathroom has a marble vanity, marble walls and Italian tiled floors.', 'The building offers 24 hour doorman and a resident manager.', 'On the top floor you can enjoy the glass enclosed sky lounge and Sun Deck with day beds, lounge chairs, tables, wet bar, ping pong table, HDTV home Theatre System, WiFi, outdoor shower, and a very nice laundry facility.', 'Financial District History meets modern-day allure in FiDi, the mecca of finance, commerce and technology located on the tip of Manhattan.', 'Among sweeping vistas of the Brooklyn Bridge and New York Harbor, architecturally distinct buildings from yesteryear have been beautifully refurbished and are complemented by luxury residential high rises.', 'Few steps from several subways, actually near the 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, C, E, J, M, R, and W lines and a wide array of museums, bars, restaurants and shopping.', 'Building Amenities Concierge Doorman Elevator Garage Health Club Laundry Roof Deck Subway Valet', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE/EMAIL 917-353-3448 <URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
